About

Holo Alfa is a minimalist, mobile first Jekyll theme with focus on readability and content. Created for free and for fun by Stijn. Get the latest version at the Github repository.

Holo Alfa is open source, MIT license.

Desenvolvido utilizando Jekyll e GitHub Pages, tema
Holo Alfa por Stijn e escrito pelo time de Engenharia do Viva Decora.
